comments.body:
you are missing indentation here, this should be:

options:
  config:

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +47,51 @@  - This module works with connection C(network_cli).
    See L(IOS Platform Options,../network/user_guide/platform_ios.html).
options:
  config:
    description: A dictionary of VLANs options
